wrapScienceJ.metaData.container

Class MetaDataRetriever

  • java.lang.Object
    • wrapScienceJ.metaData.container.MetaDataContainer
      • wrapScienceJ.metaData.container.MetaData
        • wrapScienceJ.metaData.container.MetaDataRetriever
  • Direct Known Subclasses:
    MetaCalibration3D, MetaDataSet, MetaValue

    public abstract class MetaDataRetriever
extends MetaData
    Allows to retrieve metadata from several sources according to a policy. Policies (MetaDataRetriever.RetrievalPolicy) give possibility or priority to known/initial values, reading from a configuration file or prompting the user with a dialog box.

    • Nested Class Summary

      Nested Classes

    • Constructor Detail

      • MetaDataRetriever

        public MetaDataRetriever(java.lang.String fileNamePostfix,
                         MetaDataRetriever.RetrievalPolicy retrievalPolicy,
                         java.lang.String subdir)
        Creates a DoubleValueConfig with initial value zero.
        Parameters:
        fileNamePostfix - The short human readable title, used as a postfix in conf files (e.g. for use as dialog box title)
        retrievalPolicy - The policy to retrieve the parameters (known values, config file, user input...)
        subdir - Sub-directory of the default gobal directory in which the default global metadata file should be looked for.
        See Also:
        MetaData.MetaData(String)

      • MetaDataRetriever

        public MetaDataRetriever(java.lang.String fileNamePostfix,
                         MetaDataRetriever.RetrievalPolicy retrievalPolicy)
        Creates a DoubleValueConfig with initial value zero.
        Parameters:
        fileNamePostfix - The short human readable title, used as a postfix in conf files (e.g. for use as dialog box title)
        retrievalPolicy - The policy to retrieve the parameters (known values, config file, user input...)
        See Also:
        MetaData.MetaData(String)

      • debug

        public void debug()
        Prints a message on the standard error stream suggesting to save calibration data. Pops a message up in case the image is NOT clibrated (failure...)

      • promptUserDialog

        public static void promptUserDialog(java.lang.String dialogTitle,
                                    MetaDataContainer config)
        Retrieves the scale for the voxels. either from a configuration file, or from a dialog box. If the image is already calibrated and force is false, the image is left unchanged. Otherwise, a configuration file is sought, and if that fails, a dialog asks the user for data.
        Parameters:
        dialogTitle - Title for the dialog box
        config - the configuration data to ask the user

      • retrieveConfigsUsingPolicies

        public static void retrieveConfigsUsingPolicies(java.util.ArrayList<MetaDataRetriever> configRetrievers,
                                                java.lang.String guessDir,
                                                java.lang.String dialogTitle)
                                         throws java.io.IOException
        Allows to retrieve all parameters in a collection of metadata contents, each according to its policy.
        Parameters:
        configRetrievers - The input collection of Config Retrievers
        guessDir - A temptative directory where to seek first for the metadata
        dialogTitle - Title for the dialog box, if any, that prompts the user for data
        Throws:
        java.io.IOException - In case of fire read error.
